Class GameStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • control_classes.GameStatus

  • public class GameStatus
extends java.lang.Object
    GameStatus is a class that will determine the status of the game Created by niles on 09/04/2017.

      • resetGame

        public void resetGame(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players,
                      java.util.ArrayList<gameObject> bin,
                      java.util.ArrayList<gameObject> gameArray,
                      javafx.scene.Group root,
                      IOHandle io,
                      boolean[] time,
                      boolean[] delay)
        resetGame will reset the game once the game is over and will allow the user to create a new instance of the game
        Parameters:
        players - - the list of players to be destroyed; arraylist
        bin - - all the remaining objects in the game; arraylist
        gameArray - - all other objects in the game; arraylist
        root - - all shape objects in the group of the scene; Group
        io - - the IOHandle of the game; IOHandle
        time - - resetting the changes in the animation timer; boolean[]
        delay - - resetting the changes in the animation timer; boolean[]
